xx.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DES: <li>Complete "The Vector".</il><li>Only kill the targets.</il><li>No bodies found.</il>
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_ACCIDENTS_DESC: • Complete "The Vector" by eliminate all targets in accidents
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HIDDEN_DESC: • Complete "The Vector" by hiding the bodies of all targets
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HINTS_DESC: • Eliminate each infected target before Diana delivers her last hint about him
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Complete "The Vector" by eliminating every target with a headshot
xx.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_BULLETS_DESC: • Eliminate all targets with ballistic kills using precisely five bullets and without missing a shot.

en.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DES:
• Complete "The Vector."
  • Only eliminate the targets.
  • No bodies found.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_ACCIDENTS_DESC: • Complete "The Vector" by eliminating all targets in accidents.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HIDDEN_DESC: • Complete "The Vector" by hiding the bodies of all targets.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HINTS_DESC: • Eliminate each infected target before Diana delivers her last hint about them.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Complete "The Vector" by eliminating every target with a headshot.
en.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_BULLETS_DESC: • Eliminate all targets with ballistic kills using precisely five bullets and without missing a shot.

fr.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DES:
• Terminez "Le vecteur".
  • Abattez uniquement les cibles.
  • Aucun corps trouvé.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_ACCIDENTS_DESC: • Terminez "Le vecteur" en éliminant toutes les cibles dans des accidents.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HIDDEN_DESC: • Terminez "Le vecteur" en cachant les corps de toutes les cibles.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_ESCAPING_DESC: • Éliminez une cible en train de s'échapper.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HINTS_DESC: • Éliminez toutes les cibles infectées avant que Diana n'ait le temps de donner le dernier indice.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Terminez "Le vecteur" en éliminant toutes les cibles avec un tir à la tête.
fr.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_BULLETS_DESC: • Éliminez toutes les cibles par balle en en utilisant précisément cinq sans manquer un seul tir.

it.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DES:
• Completa "Il vettore".
  • Elimina solo i bersagli.
  • Nessun corpo rinvenuto.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_ACCIDENTS_DESC: • Completa "Il vettore" eliminando tutti i bersagli in incidenti.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HIDDEN_NAME: Occhio non vede, corpo non duole
it.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HIDDEN_DESC: • Completa "Il vettore" nascondendo i corpi di tutti i bersagli.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HINTS_DESC: • Elimina ciascun bersaglio infetto prima che Diana fornisca l'ultimo indizio sul suo conto.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Completa "Il vettore" eliminando ogni bersaglio con un colpo alla testa.
it.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_BULLETS_DESC: • Elimina tutti i bersagli tramite uccisioni con armi da fuoco usando solo cinque proiettili e senza mancare un colpo.

de.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DES:
• Schließen Sie "Der Vektor" ab.
  • Töten Sie nur die Ziele.
  • Verstecken Sie alle Körper.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_ACCIDENTS_DESC: • Schließen Sie „Der Vektor“ ab, indem Sie alle Ziele durch Unfälle eliminieren.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HIDDEN_DESC: • Schließen Sie „Der Vektor“ ab, indem Sie die Leichen aller Ziele verstecken.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HINTS_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie jedes infizierte Ziel, bevor Sie Dianas letzten Hinweis zu ihm erhalten.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Schließen Sie „Der Vektor“ ab, indem Sie jedes Ziel per Kopfschuss eliminieren.
de.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_BULLETS_DESC: • Schalte alle Ziele mit genau fünf Kugeln aus, ohne einen Schuss zu verfehlen.

es.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_SILENT_ASSASSIN_DES:
• Completa «El vector».
  • Mata solo a los objetivos.
  • Que no descubran cuerpos.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_ACCIDENTS_DESC: • Completa «El vector» eliminando a todos los objetivos en accidentes.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HIDDEN_DESC: • Completa «El vector» escondiendo los cadáveres de todos los objetivos.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_ESCAPING_DESC: • Elimina a un objetivo a la fuga.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HINTS_DESC: • Elimina a todos los objetivos infectados antes de que Diana te dé la última pista.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_HEADSHOTS_DESC: • Completa «El vector» eliminando a todos los objetivos de un tiro en la cabeza.
es.UI_CHALLENGES_RABIES_BULLETS_DESC: • Elimina los objetivos con disparos letales usando cinco balas de forma precisa y sin fallar un solo disparo.
